title: GET_TRAIN_BACKWARD_CARRIAGE
content:
0x456E34A// GetTrainBackwardCarriage
int GET_TRAIN_BACKWARD_CARRIAGE(Vehicle train);Parameters:train: The train handleReturns: The handle of the carriage behind this train in the chain. Otherwise returns 0 if the train is the caboose of the chain.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_TRAIN_BACKWARD_CARRIAGE
GetTrainBackwardCarriage(vehicle)
